titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the Albert Wilson Photographic Slides PC0188
titlestmt.author: Jenny Johnson

publicationstmt.publisher: Department of Special Collections and University Archives

note.p: This encoded finding aid is compliant with Stanford EAD Best Practice Guidelines, Version 1.0.

repository.corpname: Department of Special Collections and University Archives

did.physloc: Special Collections and University Archives materials are stored offsite and must be paged 48 hours in advance. For more information on paging collections, see the department's website: http://library.stanford.edu/spc.

bioghist.head: Biographical / Historical
bioghist.p: Albert Wilson (1903-1966) studied at Stanford University; he earned an AB in Botany in 1927, and an AM in Biology in 1934. Wilson was a botanist, author, and landscape architect. He authored several gardening books, and hosted gardening-themed television and radio talk shows in the San Francisco Bay Area.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: The materials are open for research use. Audio-visual materials are not available in original format, and must be reformatted to a digital use copy.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: All requests to reproduce, publish, quote from, or otherwise use collection materials must be submitted in writing to the Head of Special Collections and University Archives, Stanford University Libraries, Stanford, California 94305-6064. Consent is given on behalf of Special Collections as the owner of the physical items and is not intended to include or imply permission from the copyright owner. Such permission must be obtained from the copyright owner, heir(s) or assigns. See: http://library.stanford.edu/spc/using-collections/permission-publish. Restrictions also apply to digital representations of the original materials. Use of digital files is restricted to research and educational purposes.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: [identification of item], Albert Wilson Photographic Slides (PC0188). Department of Special Collections and University Archives, Stanford University Libraries, Stanford, Calif.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Collection consists of photographic slides of San Francisco Bay Area plants and gardens including UC Berkeley Botanical Garden & Tilden Park, California. Also includes images of the American West, New York Estates, Europe, Asia, and images of Wilson. Collection dates range from approximately 1950-1980.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: UC Berkeley Botanical Garden & Tilden Park, California; Arizona; Yellowstone; Quebec, Montreal; Nijo Castle; California Cities; photographs of Albert Wilson.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Outside of California; Santa Cruz; San Francisco.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Hawaii; Java & Sumatra; Caribbean; South America; Spain & Portugal; Germany, Switzerland, Austria; France & Italy; Greece; Asia, Hong Kong, Japan; Canada: Rockies; US: Idaho, Utah, Arizona, California, Washington, Oregon, Wyoming, Montana; New York Estates, Plants.
